name: Spring Miko Rizet
description:
◆ Story
￣￣￣￣￣￣
Vepar, an isolated island in the sea that does not belong to any nation ...
The island, which is constantly rumored to be ominous, was called the nightmare Vepar and was hated by people.

The aristocrat Erwin and his servant Rizet were attacked by pirates during the voyage.
You will escape to Vepar Island as an emergency evacuation destination.
However, due to an accident during transfer magic, they were sent to different places.

Rizet looking for a stray Elvin in cooperation with the mage's daughter Adelice ...
It's supposed to be just looking for a person, but one day it will step into the darkness of history.

◆ Game content
￣￣￣￣￣￣
Standing picture ・ ・ ・ 6 characters + 3 levels of difference
Basic CG: 40 or more (not including difference)
Play time: about 8 to 12 hours

It is a multi-ended conceived 18-prohibited RPG.
In particular, there is no element that becomes disadvantageous as the days go by, so
Feel free to explore Vepar Island.

The purpose of this game is roughly divided into the challenge of exploring Vepar Island with the mage Adelice.
Become a Hecate and draw your companions into the conception faith.
The companion who pulled in will eventually work as a mistress in the shop that I opened, so
Please look for them who have various troubles from the island.

  • This work contains many expressions of pregnancy, so please be careful if you are not good at it.
  • There are also childbirth events, but those who are not good at it can avoid it.
